headline: Alliance for Critical Infrastructure (ACI) Launches to Strengthen National Resilience
summary: NEW YORK, February 26, 2026--The Alliance for Critical Infrastructure (ACI) has officially launched as an industry-led nonprofit coalition aimed at strengthening national resilience. ACI brings together owners, operators, and industry representatives to facilitate collaboration and information exchange, ensuring that critical infrastructure works together to anticipate, deter, and respond to threats.
